articles.title: 'So flawed it’s beyond words': Sponsor slams NRL's stand-down policy - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The NRL brought in the no-fault stand-down rule to appease fans and sponsors, but Dragons and Sea Eagles sponsor Norm Black does not share the governing body's view.
articles.content:
